name: MetaSpace (itch)
description:
Prepare For MetaSpace  In Beautiful CD-Quality Full Motion Video! Come play the new interactive movie from the creators of From Space It Came, Featuring:
  • Dozen(s?) of  minutes of Full Motion Video at an astounding 320x224 Pixels!
  • More than 512 colors on screen at once!
  • Entirely simulated CD loading pauses!!
  • A Radar in the UI that does absolutely nothing!
  • Multiple Endings!* *If you count dying as an ending
  • And more!

You've crash landed on a bizarre alien planet, swarming with strange characters and terrifying alien beasts, and you need to escape using only your wits and friends you meet along the way!

Watch out, however - the escape might not be as straight-forward as you might hope!

So what are you waiting for, fellow space friend? 
Jump on into MetaSpace! And remember, every death brings you one step closer to success! Credits:

Costuming - Junk for Joy in Burbank, CA (Liam L.)
Programming - John Thomason
Music - AnnaBella T.
Editing & Filming - Cole A. Mercier
UI - Mikey
Best Alien Creature - Hannah Atkinson
